de.upb.cs.swtpra_04.qwirkle.view

Class GameActivityPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Activity
      • android.support.v4.app.SupportActivity
        • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
          • de.upb.cs.swtpra_04.qwirkle.view.GameActivityPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, android.arch.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback, android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompat.RequestPermissionsRequestCodeValidator, android.support.v4.view.KeyEventDispatcher.Component, Controller, GameController, GameControllerPlayer, BoardFragment.OnBoardFragmentListener, ChatFragment.OnChatFragmentListener, HandsFragmentPlayer.OnHandsFragmentListener

    public class GameActivityPlayer
extends android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
implements GameControllerPlayer, ChatFragment.OnChatFragmentListener, BoardFragment.OnBoardFragmentListener, HandsFragmentPlayer.OnHandsFragmentListener
    Handles UI of the game by holding different fragments for various tasks

    Interfaces: GameControllerPlayer Used for communication with server ChatFragment.OnChatFragmentListener Used to handle chat messages to be sent over the server BoardFragment.OnBoardFragmentListener Used to handle presses on board tiles

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.support.v4.app.SupportActivity
